# engine-form
Form module for Engine.

If you're looking for the JavaScript library which is beyond the scences, [there you go](https://github.com/jillix/jQuery-form-serializer)!

## Configuration

```js
{
    "form": "form.my-form"
}
```

## Module Streams

 - `data`â€“The form data object.
